text: The Brown Bears represented Brown University in ECAC women's ice hockey during the 2014–15 NCAA Division I women's ice hockey season. ==Offseason== *July 15: Seventeen players honoroed with placement on ECAC All-Academic Team. ==Recruiting== {|class="wikitable" width="80%" |- align="center" style=" background:#381C00; color:white; | Player || Position ||Nationality || Notes |- align="center" bgcolor=" " | Caroline Buckholtz || Defense || || Attended Choate-Rosemary Hall |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" | Rachael Cholak || Forward || || Played with Chicago Young Americans |- align="center" bgcolor=" " | Sam Donovan || Forward || || Played with the Elite Black (Minn.) |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" | Cynthia Kyin || Defense || || Blueliner for Chicago Mission |- align="center" bgcolor=" " | Julianne Landry || Goaltender || || Goalie for Assabet Valley |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" | Kaitlyn Swanstrom || Forward || || Played with the Minnesota Jr, Whitecaps |- align="center" bgcolor=" " | Samantha Swanstrom || Forward || || Attended Blaine (MN) HS |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" | Dara Wais || Forward || || Played for Washington Pride |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |} == Roster == ==Schedule== |- !colspan=12 style="background:#381C00; color:white;"| Regular Season ==References== Brown Category:2014 in sports in Rhode Island Category:2015 in sports in Rhode Island Category:Brown Bears women's ice hockey seasons
